feh|background|wallpaper.instructions:
Set wallpaper with command `feh --bg-scale <path_to_picture>`.
You can add the filepath to a startup script to set the background on desktop reboot

monitors|xrandr|screens|arandr.instructions: Install arandr to setup multiple monitors when using a windows manager like i3. Once you save your first setup, you can reload it using `arandr <path_to_saved_config>`
